TextView.android:text: Reason mentioned by In charge regarding Deficit / Surplus
Weights and Measurements certificate issued by legal Metrology
Whether the Stock Register entries were made as per Sales Bills (Dr Depot and Hostels)
Whether the values mentioned in bills are as per sale price fixation register
Whether the quality of the stocks stored in godown was verified and found in good condition
Whether stack cards have been prominently displayed in each stack or not
Whether godown has been computerized and receipt and delivery are being effected through computerized system
Whether the godown is maintained in hygienic condition or not
Any Repairs required for Dr Godown
